abstract: NCAA approves expansion of instant replay policy covering targeting penalties; other college football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Replay on Targeting Calls Is Expanded
headline.main: Replay on Targeting Calls Is Expanded

snippet: Replay officials will now be able to call “egregious” targeting penalties missed by on-field officials.
lead_paragraph: Replay officials will now be able to call “egregious” targeting penalties missed by on-field officials.
